title: Have We Been Training for This?
author: John "Halcyon" Styn
content:
There are so many survival skills from taking part in the “Burning Man Immersion Learning Program” (a.k.a going to Black Rock City), which are coming in handy right now. But there is also a deeper, more important Burning Man training that we need to lean into. Like the ability to look at a situation and say, “What is needed?” What would make this better?” “What do I have to Gift?”

The default world dust storm is here. What kind of Burners will we be?

First get clear on who your playa self really is. Then get to work on being that person in the new, emerging world. The world is blown apart. We have an opportunity to choose how we put it back together.

In this video I talk about how much of the current landscape can be influenced by Burning Man, including a clip of Burning Man co-founder Danger Ranger chiming in on the topic. [VIEW TRANSCRIPT]

p.s. I am so energized seeing the online ZOOM gatherings forming around theme camps and the 10 Principles. The playa spirit cannot be contained and must be expressed digitally in the immediate future. Personally, I’m hosting twice-a-day digital gatherings. It’s a lounge filled with virtual pink fur couches for us to share gratitude, creativity, and Radical Self-expression. (Every day at noon and 6pm PT)
